scenario_text.value: Hmm... Everyone seems restless.
Restless...
Don’t worry, Miyuki. I’ll always be with you.
With you...
(So that’s where these two went.)
(I wonder... Should I say something?)

(Both Haru and Miyuki are kind of hard to
talk to sometimes.)

(Although it is nice to see them getting
along so well.)
Huh?
Miyuki, that song...

Hey, Takuma, did you hear that? It sounded
like Miyuki was singing something.

Yeah, it did. It was too quiet for me to
really make it out, but I heard something.
Never mind.
(Or...was I imagining it?)
Hmm... Haru doesn’t seem too happy, does he?
No, if anything, he looks really sad.
You think so?
Then let’s go cheer him up!
No, wait, Agumon!
Haru! Miyuki!

Oh...Takuma, Agumon. How long have you been
there?
Been there?
Not too long!

Sorry. We didn’t mean to eavesdrop or
anything.
You...heard that?
Heard that?

(He’s...asking about the song, isn’t he?
Maybe we weren’t supposed to hear it.)

(Should I be honest about this, or pretend
not to have noticed?)

(Then again, I am worried about Miyuki. Maybe
I should turn the question back on them.)
(How should I respond to these two?)
Yes, I heard it.
Is it bad if I did?
Heard what?

You mean how Miyuki was singing something?
Yeah, it was quiet, but I heard it.
Me too! Me too! I definitely heard it.
Oh, so you heard it too.
Too...

Could it... Could it have been because of
you?
Huh?
No, forget it. It’s nothing.

(There it is again. That mournful
expression.)
Haru... Did you want her to sing more?
Hm?
I’m...not sure.
(I...feel like he dodged that question.)
Sorry, is it bad if I did?

Was that song supposed to be something secret
between you two?
Well...not exactly.
Not exactly...
(Haru’s expression is difficult to read.)
(The two of them do seem real close.)

(It could be he’s just jealous that someone
other than him heard his sister singing.)
Uh, heard what?

Never mind. If you didn’t hear it that’s
fine.
(He seems...a little relieved?)

(I guess he didn’t want us to have heard
anything.)
Hey, Takuma, why’d you lie?
You said you heard Miyuki singing too just—
Shhh!

You heard what Haru said, right? Let’s just
pretend we didn’t hear anything for now.
Are you sure? I guess if you say so...

All right, we’re going to see how everyone
else is doing,

but we should talk about the search for Miu.
Can you two be in the cafeteria by noon?
Me and my sister?

Yeah. Kaito’s waiting for everyone to get
together, and I’d hate to leave you two out.
Okay.
Okay...
All right, see you later, then.
My sister and I will be in the cafeteria.
Cafeteria...
